bayStackDigitalCert.name: bayStackDigitalCert

revisions.description: Ver 2: * Add object bsDigitalCertSubjectFqdn under bsDigitalCertSubjectScalars * Add bsDigitalCertForceReplacement under bsDigitalCertImportExport * Remove objects bsDigitalCertFileActionStatus and bsDigitalCertFileActionError from bsDigitalCertFileMgmt * Add objects bsDigitalCertChainPosition, bsDigitalCertSha1Hash and bsDigitalCertMd5Hash under bsDigitalCertEntry * Add object bsDigitalCertCaChainComplete under bsDigitalCertCaEntry * Add values raCert and crl in enum bsDigitalCertType * Reversed order of objects bsDigitalCertFileName, bsDigitalCertAssociatedContextName and bsDigitalCertAssociatedContextType under bsDigitalCertEntry

bayStackDigitalCert.description: Enterprise MIB for the Digital Certificate mibs.

bsDigitalCertSubjectCommonName.name: bsDigitalCertSubjectCommonName
bsDigitalCertSubjectCommonName.description: The value of the Common Name field of the subject sending the Certificate Signing Request to the Certificate Authority

bsDigitalCertSubjectEmailAddress.name: bsDigitalCertSubjectEmailAddress
bsDigitalCertSubjectEmailAddress.description: The Email Address of the subject sending the Certificate Signing Request to the Certificate Authority

bsDigitalCertSubjectOrganizationalUnit.name: bsDigitalCertSubjectOrganizationalUnit
bsDigitalCertSubjectOrganizationalUnit.description: The Organizational Unit field of the subject sending the Certificate Signing Request to the Certificate Authority

bsDigitalCertSubjectOrganization.name: bsDigitalCertSubjectOrganization
bsDigitalCertSubjectOrganization.description: The Organization of the subject sending the Certificate Signing Request to the Certificate Authority

bsDigitalCertSubjectLocality.name: bsDigitalCertSubjectLocality
bsDigitalCertSubjectLocality.description: The name of the Locality of the subject sending the Certificate Signing Request to the Certificate Authority

bsDigitalCertSubjectProvince.name: bsDigitalCertSubjectProvince
bsDigitalCertSubjectProvince.description: The Province name of the subject sending the Certificate Signing Request to the Certificate Authority

bsDigitalCertSubjectCountry.name: bsDigitalCertSubjectCountry
bsDigitalCertSubjectCountry.description: The name of the country of the subject sending the Certificate Signing Request to the Certificate Authority

bsDigitalCertSubjectIncludeIpAddress.name: bsDigitalCertSubjectIncludeIpAddress
bsDigitalCertSubjectIncludeIpAddress.description: Specifies whether all IP addresses will be included in the Subject Alternative Name extension of the Certificate Signing Request

bsDigitalCertSubjectFqdn.name: bsDigitalCertSubjectFqdn
bsDigitalCertSubjectFqdn.description: The fully qualified name of the subject

bsDigitalCertLocalResource.name: bsDigitalCertLocalResource
bsDigitalCertLocalResource.description: The type of resource to be exported

bsDigitalCertPkcs12Passphrase.name: bsDigitalCertPkcs12Passphrase
bsDigitalCertPkcs12Passphrase.description: Specifies the passphrase to use for encrypting and decrypting pkcs#12 containers

bsDigitalCertLocalName.name: bsDigitalCertLocalName
bsDigitalCertLocalName.description: The name of the file or key pair to be imported or exported from nvram. Ignored for CSR, PKCS#7 and PKCS#12.

bsDigitalCertFileAssociatedContextName.name: bsDigitalCertFileAssociatedContextName
bsDigitalCertFileAssociatedContextName.description: The name of the context to associate imported and exported files

bsDigitalCertFileAssociatedContextType.name: bsDigitalCertFileAssociatedContextType
bsDigitalCertFileAssociatedContextType.description: The type of the context to associate imported and exported files

bsDigitalCertRemoteFileName.name: bsDigitalCertRemoteFileName
bsDigitalCertRemoteFileName.description: The address and name of the file to be imported or exported on a remote location

bsDigitalCertFileSupport.name: bsDigitalCertFileSupport
bsDigitalCertFileSupport.description: The storage type of the file to be imported or exported

bsDigitalCertSftpUsername.name: bsDigitalCertSftpUsername
bsDigitalCertSftpUsername.description: The username to log into when accessing the SFTP server

bsDigitalCertUsbUnitNumber.name: bsDigitalCertUsbUnitNumber
bsDigitalCertUsbUnitNumber.description: The unit number whose USB to access

bsDigitalCertForceReplacement.name: bsDigitalCertForceReplacement
bsDigitalCertForceReplacement.description: Controls whether a name conflict will be resolved by replacing the old file with the new one

bsDigitalCertAction.name: bsDigitalCertAction
bsDigitalCertAction.description: Specifies the action to be taken on the previously specified file

bsDigitalCertActionStatus.name: bsDigitalCertActionStatus
bsDigitalCertActionStatus.description: Displays the status of the latest action

bsDigitalCertActionError.name: bsDigitalCertActionError
bsDigitalCertActionError.description: Displays the error message that occurent during the latest action, if any

bsDigitalCertSourceFileName.name: bsDigitalCertSourceFileName
bsDigitalCertSourceFileName.description: The name of the file to be copied, moved or renamed

bsDigitalCertSourceContextName.name: bsDigitalCertSourceContextName
bsDigitalCertSourceContextName.description: The name of the context where the source file is located

bsDigitalCertSourceContextType.name: bsDigitalCertSourceContextType
bsDigitalCertSourceContextType.description: The type of the context where the source file is located

bsDigitalCertDestinationFileName.name: bsDigitalCertDestinationFileName
bsDigitalCertDestinationFileName.description: A new name for the source file or its copy

bsDigitalCertDestinationContextName.name: bsDigitalCertDestinationContextName
bsDigitalCertDestinationContextName.description: The name of the context where to place the source file or its copy

bsDigitalCertDestinationContextType.name: bsDigitalCertDestinationContextType
bsDigitalCertDestinationContextType.description: The type of the context where to place the source file or its copy

bsDigitalCertFileAction.name: bsDigitalCertFileAction
bsDigitalCertFileAction.description: Specifies the action to be taken on the previously specified file. Moving a file within the same CA entry will result in a rename.

bsDigitalCertKeyTable.name: bsDigitalCertKeyTable
bsDigitalCertKeyTable.description: Table containing all the information related to the key-pair, required to get the Digital Certificate from the Certificate Authority.

bsDigitalCertKeyEntry.name: bsDigitalCertKeyEntry
bsDigitalCertKeyEntry.description: The entry specifies the key-pair name, size, the algorithm used for the generation of key-pair and if the user is allowed to export it.

bsDigitalCertKeyName.name: bsDigitalCertKeyName
bsDigitalCertKeyName.description: Refers to the name of the key-pair generated or imported for the subject

bsDigitalCertKeyType.name: bsDigitalCertKeyType
bsDigitalCertKeyType.description: Defines the algorithm used to generate the key-pair

bsDigitalCertKeySize.name: bsDigitalCertKeySize
bsDigitalCertKeySize.description: Defines the size of the key-pair to be generated

bsDigitalCertKeyFingerprint.name: bsDigitalCertKeyFingerprint
bsDigitalCertKeyFingerprint.description: Displays the SHA1 fingerprint of the key pair

bsDigitalCertCaTable.name: bsDigitalCertCaTable
bsDigitalCertCaTable.description: Table containing all the information related to the Certificate Authority issuing the Digital Certificate

bsDigitalCertCaEntry.name: bsDigitalCertCaEntry
bsDigitalCertCaEntry.description: Entry containing information about the Certificate Authority

bsDigitalCertCaName.name: bsDigitalCertCaName
bsDigitalCertCaName.description: User defined name referring to the Certificate Authority issuing the Digital Certificate

bsDigitalCertCaCommonName.name: bsDigitalCertCaCommonName
bsDigitalCertCaCommonName.description: Defines the Common Name of the Certificate Authority issuing the Digital Certificate

bsDigitalCertCaKeyName.name: bsDigitalCertCaKeyName
bsDigitalCertCaKeyName.description: Defines the name of the associated key pair . It refers to the Key Name entry of the bsDigitalCertKeyTable

bsDigitalCertCaCaUrl.name: bsDigitalCertCaCaUrl
bsDigitalCertCaCaUrl.description: Defines the URL of the Certificate Authority issuing the Digital Certificate

bsDigitalCertCaAction.name: bsDigitalCertCaAction
bsDigitalCertCaAction.description: specifies the various actions Certificate Authority can take- 'noop' - No operation 'caauth' - Athenticates the Certificate Authority (CA) based on the previously retrieved Root CA Certificate. 'enroll' - Certificate Enrolment Request. 'renew' - Certificate Renew Request. 'remove' - Removes the subject certificate obtained online from the Certificate Authority. 'getCrl' - Get the Certificate Revocation List from the CDP. 'genSelfSig'- Generate a self-signed certificate. 'getCaCert' - Retrieve Root CA certificate from the Certificate Authority

bsDigitalCertCaActionChallengePassword.name: bsDigitalCertCaActionChallengePassword
bsDigitalCertCaActionChallengePassword.description: specifies the challenge password required to perform the scep operation

bsDigitalCertCaAuthenticated.name: bsDigitalCertCaAuthenticated
bsDigitalCertCaAuthenticated.description: Specifies whether the Online Certificate Authority is authenticated

bsDigitalCertCaLastActionStatus.name: bsDigitalCertCaLastActionStatus
bsDigitalCertCaLastActionStatus.description: Specifies the status of the last action 'none' - No action was performed yet. 'success' - Execution of the action triggered is completed successfully. 'failed' - Execution of the action triggered has failed. 'inProgress' - Execution of the action triggered is in progress.

bsDigitalCertCaLastActionFailureReason.name: bsDigitalCertCaLastActionFailureReason
bsDigitalCertCaLastActionFailureReason.description: Defines the reason of failure for the last action performed by the Certificate Authority

bsDigitalCertCaSubjectCertificateValidit.name: bsDigitalCertCaSubjectCertificateValidityDays
bsDigitalCertCaSubjectCertificateValidit.description: Number of days for which subject certificate will remain valid

bsDigitalCertCaUsePost.name: bsDigitalCertCaUsePost
bsDigitalCertCaUsePost.description: specifies the HTTP request type : URL or POST , TRUE for EJBCA and FALSE for Win2012 CA

bsDigitalCertUseFor.name: bsDigitalCertUseFor
bsDigitalCertUseFor.description: Specifies for what features will use the subject certificate from this CA. Features are represented in form of bits as follows: bit 0 - IKE bit 1 - SSL server bit 2 - SSL client bit 3 - SLAmon bit 4 - Cloud

bsDigitalCertRegenerateKeyOnEnroll.name: bsDigitalCertRegenerateKeyOnEnroll
bsDigitalCertRegenerateKeyOnEnroll.description: Specifies whether the associated key pair will be regenerated on re-enroll

bsDigitalCertCaChainComplete.name: bsDigitalCertCaChainComplete
bsDigitalCertCaChainComplete.description: Specifies whether the CA entry contains a complete certificate chain

bsDigitalCertTable.name: bsDigitalCertTable
bsDigitalCertTable.description: Table of information about digital certificates

bsDigitalCertEntry.name: bsDigitalCertEntry
bsDigitalCertEntry.description: Entry containing information about digital certificates

bsDigitalCertAssociatedContextType.name: bsDigitalCertAssociatedContextType
bsDigitalCertAssociatedContextType.description: Specifies the type of the associated context

bsDigitalCertAssociatedContextName.name: bsDigitalCertAssociatedContextName
bsDigitalCertAssociatedContextName.description: Specifies the name of the associated context

bsDigitalCertFileName.name: bsDigitalCertFileName
bsDigitalCertFileName.description: Specifies the common name value of the certificate subject

bsDigitalCertType.name: bsDigitalCertType
bsDigitalCertType.description: Identifies certificate role in a chain of trust 'caCert' - Root Certificate Authority's Certificate 'intermediateCaCert' - Intermediate Certificate Authority's Certificate 'subjectCert' - Subject Certificate 'raCert' - Registration Authority Certificate 'crl' - Certificate Revocation List

bsDigitalCertChainPosition.name: bsDigitalCertChainPosition
bsDigitalCertChainPosition.description: Certificate position in the chain or 0 if certificate is not part of the chain

bsDigitalCertVersionNumber.name: bsDigitalCertVersionNumber
bsDigitalCertVersionNumber.description: Specifies the version number of the certificate for the subject as issued by the Certificate Authority

bsDigitalCertSerialNumber.name: bsDigitalCertSerialNumber
bsDigitalCertSerialNumber.description: Specifies the serial number of the certificate for the subject as issued by the Certificate Authority

bsDigitalCertIssuerName.name: bsDigitalCertIssuerName
bsDigitalCertIssuerName.description: Specifies the issuer's name of the certificate for the subject as issued by the Certificate Authority

bsDigitalCertValidStartPeriod.name: bsDigitalCertValidStartPeriod
bsDigitalCertValidStartPeriod.description: Specifies the start date of the validation period of the certificate for the subject as issued by the Certificate Authority

bsDigitalCertValidEndPeriod.name: bsDigitalCertValidEndPeriod
bsDigitalCertValidEndPeriod.description: Specifies the last date of the validation period of the certificate for the subject as issued by the Certificate Authority

bsDigitalCertCertificateSignatureAlgorit.name: bsDigitalCertCertificateSignatureAlgorithm
bsDigitalCertCertificateSignatureAlgorit.description: Specifies the algorithm used for the issuer's signature on the certificate for the subject as issued by the Certificate Authority

bsDigitalCertCertificateSignature.name: bsDigitalCertCertificateSignature
bsDigitalCertCertificateSignature.description: Specifies the issuer's signature on the certificate for the subject as issued by the Certificate Authority

bsDigitalCertSubject.name: bsDigitalCertSubject
bsDigitalCertSubject.description: Specifies the details of the subject on its certificate as issued by Certificate Authority

bsDigitalCertSubjectPublicKeyAlgorithm.name: bsDigitalCertSubjectPublicKeyAlgorithm
bsDigitalCertSubjectPublicKeyAlgorithm.description: Specifies the algorithm used to generate the subject's public key for the certificate issued by the Certificate Authority

bsDigitalCertSubjectPublicKey.name: bsDigitalCertSubjectPublicKey
bsDigitalCertSubjectPublicKey.description: Specifies the public key of the subject

bsDigitalCertHasBasicConstraint.name: bsDigitalCertHasBasicConstraint
bsDigitalCertHasBasicConstraint.description: Specifies whether certificate contains basic certificate constraint

bsDigitalCertHasKeyUsage.name: bsDigitalCertHasKeyUsage
bsDigitalCertHasKeyUsage.description: Specifies whether certificate contains basic key usage constraint

bsDigitalCertIsCa.name: bsDigitalCertIsCa
bsDigitalCertIsCa.description: Specifies whether this is Certificate Authority's certificate or not

bsDigitalCertKeyUsage.name: bsDigitalCertKeyUsage
bsDigitalCertKeyUsage.description: specifies the purpose of the key used in the certificate. It is represented in form of bits as follows- bit 0 - digitalSignature bit 1 - nonRepudiation bit 2 - keyEncipherment bit 3 - dataEncipherment bit 4 - keyAgreement bit 5 - keyCertSign bit 6 - cRLSign bit 7 - encipherOnly bit 8 - decipherOnly

bsDigitalCertStatus.name: bsDigitalCertStatus
bsDigitalCertStatus.description: Specifies the status of the certificate

bsDigitalCertCdpUrl.name: bsDigitalCertCdpUrl
bsDigitalCertCdpUrl.description: Specifies the CDP URL present in the Extensions field of the Digital Certificate.

bsDigitalCertOcspUrl.name: bsDigitalCertOcspUrl
bsDigitalCertOcspUrl.description: Specifies the OCSP URL present in the AIA field of the Digital Certificate.

bsDigitalCertExtendedKeyUsage.name: bsDigitalCertExtendedKeyUsage
bsDigitalCertExtendedKeyUsage.description: Specifies the purpose for which the key may be used, in addition to or in place of the basic purposes indicated in the key-usage field of the certificate.
